# robots.txt for Golden State Flower Shop
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow checkout, cart, and account pages
Disallow: /*/cart/
Disallow: /*/checkout/
Disallow: /*/account/
Disallow: /auth/

# Sitemap location (dynamically generated by Next.js)
Sitemap: https://goldenstateflowershop.com/sitemap.xml
